title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 178.4 - Boundary streets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 178.4 - Boundary streets

State Regulations

For the purposes of this Part, a nonsolicitation area shall
include all properties abutting the boundary streets named in the description
of the nonsolicitation area. The intent being that the nonsolicitation area
shall include properties on both sides of the boundary
streets. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
178.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
